title: Oklahoma sheriff to resign after indictments linked to fatal shooting
text:
Published By: Reuters - US News - Today 
TULSA, Okla. (Reuters) - Tulsa County Sheriff Stanley Glanz announced plans on Wednesday to resign after a grand jury recommended that he be...
